metadata.name: Wmiexec Default Output File
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of the default output filename used by the wmiexec tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND file.path rlike '\\\\Windows\\\\__1\\d\{9\}\\.\\d\{1,7\}$' AND file.path rlike 'C:\\\\__1\\d\{9\}\\.\\d\{1,7\}$' AND file.path rlike 'D:\\\\__1\\d\{9\}\\.\\d\{1,7\}$')

output.summary: Detects the creation of the default output filename used by the wmiexec tool
